original: 「唔…我可不是貪圖玉璽啊，不過暫放我這擔保也好。三千兵馬借你，再封你為折沖校尉、殄寇將軍，平定之後就速速歸來。」
text: "Well...I'm not greedy for Yuxi, but it's okay to give me this guarantee for the time being. Three thousand soldiers and horses will lend you, and you will be named as Captain Zhechong and General Shoukou. After calm down, I will return quickly."
